attributes.action: The rams head haydock  the council must agree with the plans to refurb  into a hotel  as this delapidated eyesore  is a blot  on the landscape
attributes.additional_details: the rams head church road haydock is a blot on the landscape  the community  needs the council to agree to the plans to turn it into a luxury hotel its delapidated  state  has made  our houses unsellable  and the once fine building  has been left  to  rot  we need the building saved  and our area  cleaned up
